title: Print, "Design for a Frame and a Cartouche", 1745
medium: Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper
inscribed: On plate, upper left: 20me. Livre.; upper center: C.P.S.C.M.; upper right: V; center, in cartouche: LIVRE/DE/DEVELOPEMENS/DE BORDURES/DE TABLEAUX./INVENTES/Par M.F. de CUVILLIES/Premier Architect/de S.A.S.E. de BAVIERE,/Et Gravés/par F. de Cuvilliés-fils.; lower center: Se vend à Paris chez le Sr. Poilly ruë St. Iacques a l'jmage S. Bênoit, Avec Privilége du Roy, ét chez l'auteur.; lower right: 1
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux (D. 80 and 81)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for a Frame and a Cartouche", 1745.
1745. Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-285-112.
